Room.Name: Marina/Eidenhoft Alley
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a narrow, winding alley just east of Eidenhoft Boulevard.
Room.LongDescription: A number of speciality shops are here in the alley, and there is a lot of foot traffic going between the narrow walkway and Eidenhoft Boulevard to the east. A story you overheard in the Dragon Claw makes you think this is the alley where a school for pickpockets is located. Hold on to your wallet as you walk through here. On the south side of the alley is a narrow doorway leading to the headquarters of a mercernary group.
